metadata.title: CVE-2023-3772 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the Linux kernelâ€™s IP framework for transformingpackets (XFRM subsystem). This issue may allow a malicious user withCAP_NET_ADMIN privileges to directly dereference a NULL pointer inxfrm_update_ae_params(), leading to a possible kernel crash and denial ofservice.
